FuncDef: The display ospfv3 bfd session command displays BFD session information of an OSPFv3 process. The display ospfv3 bfd session command displays BFD session information of an OSPFv3 process. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a process ID of OSPFv3.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Specifies the number of an interface.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the neighbor router ID.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Displays detailed information of the neighbor.
-
